<Text: Tharangambadi, formerly Tranquebar, is a town in the Nagapattinam district of the Indian state of Tamil Nadu.>

Text: Tharangambadi:  It lies 15 km north of Karaikal, near the mouth of a distributary of the Kaveri River.
Triplets:<Tharangambadi
